title: I need an outbound phone caller to collect data from local businesses.
snippet:
I need someone to call a list of restaurants in the Toronto, Ontario, Canada area and ask a few quick questions.  The list of businesses and phone numbers will be provided. There are approximately 2,500 business to call.  Each call should take approximately 30-60 seconds.  Data will be entered into an already existing web-form so that data entry is hassle-free.

Requirements:
- Looking for someone with fluency in English
- Excellent phone manner
- Access to a phone or phone app to make calls to Toronto, Ontario, Canada (Note: Skype does not allow high volume outbound phone calls)

There is potential for more work of a similar fashion down the line.
